content: row 5 ch1 single_crochet into the first double_crochet 《picot double_crochet into the next double_crochet ch1 picot double_crochet into next chain space》x4 ch1 picot double_crochet into the next double_crochet single_crochet into the 3rdch of the next ch5 space x7 ​9 ​ ​11 ​ continued in row 6 row 6 single_crochet along the side towards the foundation chain at the corner chain 45 single_crochet into the 2nd chain from hook single_crochet into the other 43chs single_crochet into each chain along the foundation ​ i e the chains you started with it should give the same number of stitches as chains that you started with ​ ch45 c into the 2nd chain from hook single_crochet into the other 43chs single_crochet along the side ​towards the bottom edge ​ slip_stitch into the first single_crochet of row 5 fasten_off weave in ends and steam block/iron flat
